resources.string: The default key of this AP could be guessed, hence this AP is unsafe. If this AP isn\'t yours, warn the owner about this security issue.
Sets the time in seconds between scans when autoscan is enabled.

WLAN Audit (C) 2011 Roberto Estrada

Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0

You may obtain a copy of the License at

http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

WLANAudit is an application to audit the security of WLAN Access points. The application tries to guess the access point default password via a public known algorithm. This app is NOT MEANT to be used as a hacking utility, so i'm not responsible of the usage you make of it.

You can download the source code from:
https://github.com/RobertoEstrada/WLANAudit-Android

Based on the code from http://f8.ath.cx/codigo.txt

The icon is licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0 License and is derived from icons from Open Security Architecture http://www.opensecurityarchitecture.org/cms/en/library/icon-library

WiFi won\'t be turned on automatically if it was inactive on application\'s start
WiFi will be turned on automatically if it was inactive on application\'s start
